Container.Name: OrchardCoreCMS
Container.Overview: This app installs Orchard Core CMS official docker image to Unraid. After installing the container, open the WebUI to finalize the setup. Notes: The administrator password has to be complex enough. Otherwise you get error: please enter the required format. When the bar under it turns green it's okay. Some templates hide admin dashboard. Append /Admin to your URL to access it, like http://your-address:port/Admin . If you want to start over with the container, stop the container, go to /mnt/user/appdata/orchardcorecms in Unraid server and remove folder App_Data and everything under it.
